title: Queen Sheba
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Ethiopian, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Ethiopian restaurant offering a bargain all-you-can-eat vegan lunch buffet Mon-Fri for $7.99 which usually features salad, spinach, rice, green beans, cabbage, potatoes, carrots, yellow lentils, red lentils, bengal lentils, and injera bread. A la carte menu available at other times.
